item.title: Downcasting automatically with dynamic keyword
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop The dynamic keyword can be used to to automatically downcast a variable to the correct type when calling a method. This technique is useful when having a variable of a base type, and a method needs to be called using a derived type. Lets look at a few examples, which will help make things a bit clearer.
